retro.description: Retro classic games from your childhood.

game.title: Super Mario World
game.short_description: Join Mario and Luigi on their adventure to save Princess Peach from Bowser's clutches in this classic platformer.
game.full_description: Experience the classic platforming adventure with Mario and Luigi in Super Mario World.
game.author: Nintendo

game.title: The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past
game.short_description: Embark on a quest with Link to rescue Princess Zelda and defeat the evil sorcerer Agahnim in this classic action-adventure game.
game.full_description: Join Link on a legendary adventure to rescue Princess Zelda and defeat the evil sorcerer Agahnim.
game.author: Nintendo

game.title: Super Metroid
game.short_description: Help Samus Aran explore the planet Zebes, defeat the Space Pirates, and stop the evil Mother Brain in this classic action-adventure game.
game.full_description: Help Samus Aran in her mission to explore Zebes, defeat Space Pirates, and stop Mother Brain.
game.author: Nintendo

game.title: Castlevania: Symphony of the Night
game.short_description: Play as Alucard, the son of Dracula, as you explore Dracula's castle, defeat powerful enemies, and uncover the secrets of the night.
game.full_description: Explore Dracula's castle as Alucard in this critically acclaimed action-adventure game.
game.author: Konami

game.title: Metroid Fusion
game.short_description: Help Samus Aran overcome an infection caused by the X Parasite, uncover the secrets of the research station, and save the galaxy.
game.full_description: Join Samus Aran in her mission to overcome the X Parasite infection and uncover the secrets of the research station.
game.author: Nintendo

game.title: Pac-Man Collection
game.short_description: Enjoy four classic Pac-Man games in one package: Pac-Man, Pac-Mania, Pac-Attack, and Pac-Man Arrangement.
game.full_description: Relive the arcade magic with Pac-Man Collection, featuring four classic Pac-Man games in one package.
game.author: Namco

game.title: Mario Kart Super Circuit
game.short_description: Race with Mario and friends through challenging tracks to win the coveted Mario Kart trophies. Unlock new tracks and master power-ups to outsmart opponents.
game.full_description: Join Mario and friends in exciting kart racing action with challenging tracks and power-ups.
game.author: Nintendo

game.title: Super Mario Bros. 3
game.short_description: Join Mario and Luigi on their quest to rescue Princess Peach and save the Mushroom Kingdom from the clutches of Bowser.
game.full_description: Help Mario and Luigi rescue Princess Peach and save the Mushroom Kingdom from Bowser in this classic platformer.
game.author: Nintendo

game.title: Mega Man X
game.short_description: Battle the evil forces of Sigma and his army of Mavericks as the powerful Mega Man X in this action-packed platformer.
game.full_description: Join Mega Man X in his battle against Sigma and his army of Mavericks in this action-packed platformer.
game.author: Capcom

game.title: Street Fighter II
game.short_description: Street Fighter II is a competitive fighting game featuring a variety of characters with unique fighting styles and special moves.
game.full_description: Experience the classic fighting game Street Fighter II, featuring iconic characters and intense battles.
game.author: Capcom

game.title: Super Mario Bros.
game.short_description: Super Mario Bros. is a platform game where players control Mario as he travels through the Mushroom Kingdom to rescue Princess Toadstool from Bowser.
game.full_description: Join Mario on his classic adventure to rescue Princess Toadstool from Bowser in the original Super Mario Bros.
game.author: Nintendo

game.title: Donkey Kong
game.short_description: Donkey Kong is an arcade game where players control Jumpman (later known as Mario) as he attempts to rescue a damsel in distress from Donkey Kong.
game.full_description: Help Jumpman (Mario) rescue a damsel in distress from Donkey Kong in this classic arcade game.
game.author: Nintendo

game.title: Space Invaders
game.short_description: Space Invaders is a classic arcade shooter where players control a laser cannon and defend against waves of invading aliens.
game.full_description: Defend against waves of invading aliens in the classic arcade shooter Space Invaders.
game.author: Taito

game.title: Contra
game.short_description: A classic run-and-gun action game where players battle through various levels to defeat an evil organization.
game.full_description: Join the fight against an evil organization in the classic run-and-gun action game Contra.
game.author: Konami
